desc: This method is used to invite a user to a channel. The calling user must be a member of the channel.

errors.channel_not_found: Value passed for channel was invalid.
errors.user_not_found: Value passed for user was invalid.
errors.cant_invite_self: Authenticated user cannot invite themselves to a channel.
errors.not_in_channel: Authenticated user is not in the channel.
errors.already_in_channel: Invited user is already in the channel.
errors.cant_invite: User cannot be invited to this channel.
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
errors.user_is_bot: This method cannot be called by a bot user.
errors.user_is_ultra_restricted: This method cannot be called by a single channel guest.
